person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Diplomats said General Joseph Garba of Nigeria , a U.N. General Assembly president in 1989-90 , was putting forth his own candidacy without being nominated by his country .

Let's think step by step.

1. Diplomats (group of people)
2. General Joseph Garba (Person)
3. Nigeria (Country)

So, the identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. General Joseph Garba.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

The identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. General Joseph Garba.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Diplomats said General Joseph Garba of Nigeria , a U.N. General Assembly president in 1989-90 , was putting forth his own candidacy without being nominated by his country .

Let's think step by step.

1. Nigeria
2. United Nations (implied, as General Garba is a Nigerian diplomat at the UN and was a president of the UN General Assembly)
3. U.N. General Assembly (mentioned as the body where General Garba served as president)
4. 1989-90 (mentioned as the time period when General Garba served as president of the U.N. General Assembly)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Nigeria
2. United Nations

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to locations. The other entities mentioned (U.N. General Assembly and 1989-90) are not locations but rather organizations and time periods.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Diplomats said General Joseph Garba of Nigeria , a U.N. General Assembly president in 1989-90 , was putting forth his own candidacy without being nominated by his country .

Let's think step by step.

1. United Nations (UN)
2. U.N. General Assembly
3. Nigeria
4. General Joseph Garba (can be considered as an individual, but since he is identified as being from an organization, I'll consider it here)

So, the organizations mentioned in the paragraph are the United Nations and Nigeria.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
The United Nations (UN) is the only organization explicitly mentioned in the paragraph. Nigeria can be considered a country rather than an organization in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
